name: Maglite AA Flashlight
description: This high-quality palm-size flashlight has a focusable beam. A rotary on/off switch eliminates the possibility of mechanical failure and a potential point for water entry. Both the top and end are sealed with O-rings to protect it from rain and splashes.  Unscrew the top, and set the flashlight body upright in it to create a candle-type light that frees your hands and illuminates 360°.Anodized aluminum body is knurled for slip-resistant grip.2 AA batteries and spare bulb included.Bulb typically lasts through five sets of batteries. Spare is stored in the end cap to protect it from damage.
